Detailed Description

Class that defines the look and feel of the DAZ Studio interface.

PixmapMode  mode,
PixmapState  state 
) [slot]

A Pixmap from the DzAction with the class name.
QPixmap * DzStyle::adjustHSV ( QImage  img,
const QColor &  c,
const QColor &  bgColor,
bool  blend 
) [static]

Adjusts and blends the image to the given color and background color. Typically used to make icon images match the interface foreground/background color.

Parameters:
img The source image to adjust
c The foreground color.
bgColor The background color.
blend If true, the alpha channel of the image is used to blend in the background color.
Returns:
A pointer to a new pixmap containing the converted image.
void DzStyle::adjustHSV ( QPixmap &  pix,
const QColor &  c 
) [static]

Adjusts and blends the pixmap to the given color and background color. Typically used to make icon images match the interface color.

Parameters:
pix The pixmap to adjust
c The color.
void DzStyle::adjustHSV ( QPixmap &  pix,
QPalette::ColorRole  role 
) [static]

Adjusts and blends the pixmap to the given color and background color. Typically used to make icon images match the interface color.

Parameters:
pix The pixmap to adjust
role The color from the palette to use.
QImage DzStyle::adjustHSVImage ( QImage  img,
const QColor &  c,
const QColor &  bgColor,
bool  blend 
) [static]

Adjusts and blends the image to the given color and background color. Typically used to make icon images match the interface foreground/background color.

Parameters:
img The source image to adjust.
c The foreground color.
bgColor The background color.
blend If true, the alpha channel of the image is used to blend in the background color.
Returns:
The adjusted copy of the given image.
void DzStyle::blendImage ( QImage  front,
QImage  back 
) [static]

Blends the two images based on the alpha channels.

Parameters:
front The front image
back The back image - this image is blended into the front image based on the alpha channel of the front image.
DzError DzStyle::compileStyleDefinition ( const QString &  infile,
const QString &  outfile 
) [static, slot]

Compiles a text-based style definition and its images into a single binary style definition file.

Parameters:
infile The name of the XML-based text style description
outfile The name of the DAZ Studio style definition file to create
Returns:
true on success, false on failure

Emitted when the interface color settings have changed.

int DzStyle::pixelMetric ( const QString &  metricName  )  [slot]
Returns:
The value of the pixel metric with the given name. The name must match one of the pixel metric names from the style definition.
void DzStyle::setInterfaceColor ( int  which,
const QColor &  color 
) [slot]

Sets the given interface color to the new value. The interface will not automatically update - the current style must be reloaded before the changes will take affect.

QPixmap DzStyle::standardPixmap ( const QString &  pixmapName  )  [slot]
Returns:
A Pixmap with the given name. The name must match one of the standard pixmap names from the style definition.
QFont DzStyle::textStyle ( const QString &  styleName  )  [slot]
Returns:
The Font of the text style with the given name. The name must match one of the text style names from the style definition.
QColor DzStyle::textStyleColor ( const QString &  styleName  )  [slot]
Returns:
The Color of the text style with the given name. The name must match one of the text style names from the style definition.
